attributes.action: Deploy The Royal Navy To The English Channel
attributes.additional_details:
We have a world class Navy yet we can’t protect the integrity of our borders and security of our country from the daily invasion of illegal immigrants on our coastline. 
Our lack of response in dealing with the issue effectively has clearly encouraged and motivated more crossings in recent weeks. 
It’s likely they pose a security risk, why wouldn’t they come here legally? They receive taxpayer funded accommodation when we have Veterans sleeping on the streets. Protect The Border Deploy The Navy
attributes.background: The UK should deploy one or more of the 6 Type 45 Destroyers, 13 Type 23 or Type 26 Frigates to the English Channel to Intercept and turn around the migrant boats arriving on the southern coast of the UK on a daily basis

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334089
